Welcome to the Budget App Help Section!

Features and Tips:
1. Adding Transactions:
- Navigate to the "Add Expense" or "Add Income" screen.
- Enter the amount, category, and description of the transaction.

2. Viewing Transactions:
- Use the transaction history to see detailed records of your expenses and income.

3. Setting Budgets:
- Go to the "Set Budget" screen to define monthly or weekly budgets for categories.

4. Analyzing Reports:
- Check the reports section to view graphical representations of your spending habits.

For further assistance, contact our support team at support@budgetapp.com.

Thank you for using Budget App!
